author: costin
msg: Added the logic to check for the password on ajp13 connections.
Also cut&paste the logic to generate the 'ajp13.id' if useSecret is set
( with a random generated password and the connection info ). If a
secret is set, shutdown via ajp13 is enabled automatically.
All normal code is running as before if no secret is set.

author: costin
msg: Added the password decoding for ajp13.

author: larryi
msg: Fix tests to pass with forwardAll both "true" and "false" with Apache, IIS
Added a test to ensure "+" is converted to space in query string.

author: larryi
msg: Update to use the official JK version string

author: keith
msg: indexOf should return an index relative to the internal
starting point of the string rather than the beginning
of the array.  ByteChunk.indexOf is used to test for
safe urls, thus some leading unsafe characters were
